mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_attendance WHERE user_num = #{userNum} AND DATE(check_in_time) = CURDATE() LIMIT 1

SELECT u.user_num, u.user_name, d.department_name, p.position_name, ua.check_in_time, ua.check_out_time, ua.work_time FROM user_attendance ua JOIN user u ON ua.user_num = u.user_num JOIN user_departments d ON u.department_id = d.department_id JOIN user_positions p ON u.position_id = p.position_id WHERE MATCH(u.user_name) AGAINST(#{searchTerm} IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND ua.check_in_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
